notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, W.R.P.-B.; methodology, W.R.P.-B. and L.J.N.G.; validation, J.A.P.-R. and O.J.P.-L.; investigation, W.R.P.-B., J.J.B.C. and L.J.N.G.; resources, J.A.P.-R. and O.J.P.-L.; data curation and formal analysis, W.R.P.-B. and E.H.D.; writing—original draft preparation, J.J.B.C.; writing—review and editing, J.A.P.-R. and O.J.P.-L.; visualization, W.A.D.Á.; supervision, L.E.C.S.; project administration, O.J.P.-L.; funding acquisition, J.A.P.-R. and O.J.P.-L. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
